glosses: withdrawing to a stronghold, fortifying, entrenching

examples.text: Takbriben 1000-1500 silâhlı kadar tahmin edilen asiler tamamen Kutu deresine tahassun etmişlerdir.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish تحصن, from Arabic تَحَصُّن (taḥaṣṣun), verbal noun of تَحَصَّنَ (taḥaṣṣana, “to fortify oneself, to be protected”).
